name: Buffer Busters
description:
Show that cheeky engine who's the fastest engine on the line!    Controls:   

       Mash the Shovel Coal key to build up a head of steam!       Signal to switch tracks before you enter the shunt!

        Blue Engine:   W (Shovel Coal),  A or D (Switch Track)        Red Engine:  Up (Shovel Coal),  Left or Right (Switch Track)

    To Start, press 1 for single player, 2 for two players

Music by The Tuggster Intensifies [https://soundcloud.com/hkporterbedt/super-mario-land]

Made with the AllegroJs framework by Sos Sosowski [http://allegrojs.net/].

With a shout out to Shawn Hargreaves for the original Allegro library.

Dedicated to Michael, on his birthday.
